map.item:
In this experiment, you will see two words presented one after another in each trial. The first word will be [PRIME_COLOR], and the second word will be [TARGET_COLOR]. When the second word of the pair is presented your task is to determine whether the two words are related to one another or unrelated, and press the appropriate button.
If the two words are related to one another, press [RELATED_BUTTON].
If the two words are not related to one another, press [UNRELATED_BUTTON].
Try to respond as quickly and accurately as possible.
Press either button to begin.

Related Pair = press [RELATED_BUTTON] Unrelated Pair = press [UNRELATED_BUTTON]
Press either button to continue.

You will start by doing a few trials for practice.
Press either button to begin when you are ready.

Practice trials complete!
Please wait for instructions from the experimenter.

Take a rest!
The next set will begin soon.

Take a rest!
Press either button to move on when you are ready.
You have completed the experiment. Thank you for participating. Press [RELATED_BUTTON] or [UNRELATED_BUTTON] to exit the program.
